summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CHCIAI AI transformation agency platform. All major features working: 7-step process visualization, Clawix chatbot with qualification logic, security section with trust badges, backend endpoints for leads/onboarding/academy, and mobile responsive design.

design_issues.issue: Theme toggle may use different implementation - functionality unclear
